title: Tare (Seasoning Sauce)
directions: Combine all of the ingredients in a small saucepan and bring to a boil over medium-high heat, then lower the heat to a simmer and cook for 5 minutes, stirring to make sure the sugar is fully dissolved. Cool to room temperature, then store in an airtight container in the fridge. This is best if used within a week, but it’ll keep for a couple weeks.
